source_caption_data.pre_caption:
This breathtaking night scene showcases the vibrant green aurora borealis illuminating a starry sky. A tall, snow-dusted evergreen tree stands prominently in the center of the frame, rising from a snowy landscape dotted with a forest of other pines.

This is a time-lapse video. The aurora and clouds can be seen moving across the sky.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption:
This breathtaking night scene showcases the vibrant green aurora borealis illuminating a starry sky. A tall, snow-dusted evergreen tree stands prominently in the center of the frame, rising from a snowy landscape dotted with a forest of other pines.

This is a time-lapse video. The aurora and clouds can be seen moving across the sky.

generated_critique: The caption should mention that a group of people can be seen walking through the snowy landscape beneath the moving aurora and clouds.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This breathtaking night scene showcases the vibrant green aurora borealis illuminating a starry sky. A tall, snow-dusted evergreen tree stands prominently in the center of the frame, rising from a snowy landscape dotted with a forest of other pines. In this time-lapse video, the aurora and clouds can be seen moving across the sky, while a group of people walks through the snowy landscape beneath.
